title: Prover Container Doesn't Work
body:
In following Dockerfile, the prover application doesn't work because of `localhost:8088 connection refused`.
How can I fix this error?
Do you have any idea about this?
https://github.com/matter-labs/zksync/blob/master/docker/prover/Dockerfile

Thank you!
I think the prover server is working on the operator server so this is just my misstakeing.
